SCTX:
begin explosion_pushout

float startval
float curval
float currshift

short xdir
short state
short initialized

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( initialized == 0 )
	;make a prop

	set xdir to 1
	set curval to GetPos X
	set startval to curval
	set state to 1

	set initialized to 1
endif

if ( state == 1 )
	set currshift to 500 * GetSecondsPassed
	set currshift to currshift * xdir
	set curval to curval + currshift
	SetPos X curval

	if ( GetCollidingPC )
		MessageBox "hit PC"
		player->sethealth 0
	endif
	if ( GetCollidingActor )
		MessageBox "hit somethin else"
	endif

	HurtCollidingActor 500
	
	if ( xdir < 0 )
		set currshift to startval - curval
	else
		set currshift to curval - startval 
	endif

	if ( currshift  > 800 )
		MessageBox "Explosion complete. ptdiff = %.2f" currshift
		Disable
		SetDelete 1
		set state to 2
	endif
endif


end
